choices: Try either power on someone on campus
Try either on someone off campus
1.content:
Shu was returning to his dorm from another boring day of class. He is at a point where he is unsure what he wants in life. He does alright in his classes but it does not particularly make him excited. As he is about to open his room door he sees Choa waving at him.

"At least it is something to look forward to" Shu mutters as he waves back. He opens the door to his room, it does not seem like James is back from class yet. "he is probably off doing some tutoring" Shu thinks to himself.

Once Shu puts down his bag he hears a strange sound coming from his room. Opening his door he is met with an old looking book open on his bed, his room fan is on and it is pushing the page on the book....but the page is not turning. It is like it is stuck there.

Touching the book Shu sees an indescribable language of seemingly random symbols. Suddenly he feels a rush to his head and he quickly passes out.

A couple hours pass and Shu wakes up on the floor of his room with a pounding sensation in his head.

"What the fuck was that" he says as he gathers himself.

Shu now feels like hes gained a tremendous amount of information. He positions his right hand into a finger gun and a small blue light emits from the tip of his pointer finger. "So I can point this at someone, pretend to fire, and they will turn into a suit....that I can wear?" Shu is not especially impressed by this far-fetched tale. The book is nowhere in sight, and his finger is clearly glowing,

What should Shu do.....
1.title: The start

info.brief_description: A boy gets the power to turn people into skin suits
info.description:
Powers
Shu can turn people into skin suits
When someone is turned into a skin suit, Shu may blow into the entrance point like a balloon. This will cause the body to come alive again and will act in accordance to Shu's orders. If Shu gives no order, it will continue its life like nothing ever happened.
Shu can also possess people


Rules:
Keep the powers to possession or skin suits
Shu cannot die
No abrupt endings
No Gore or violence
Sex is allowed

Characters:

Shu - 22 year old man and our main character who is at this time in the middle of college, just an average guy with an average build, he has short black hair and wears glasses; most would not consider him attractive. He lives in a small apartment complex. Personality-wise he is timid and shy but smart and calculated

James - Shu's childhood friend who he lives with on college residence. A chilled and laid back guy that does not have much luck with the ladies. Despite this, it does not particularly bother him. He is slightly taller than Shu with an average build.

May Heir - 21 Shu's childhood friend and a tomboy, she is very tall for her age and occasionally teases Shou because of him being shorter than her, besides that she is very kind with a strong sense of justice; she is studying law at the local university. She has long wavy blonde hair usually kept in place by a hat or in a ponytail, D-cup breasts and a nice ass, usually seen wearing stylish or trendy clothes that you would usually see a guy wear.

Mr. Ladd Bartholomew - 43 ; the Dean of Shu's college, a strict and stoic large man, someone who tries to be fair to the students but in the end has a bad reputation, usually wearing a tailored suit.

Marie Stevens - 22, Harper's twin sister and the more flirtatious of the two, she is studying fashion and thus tries to keep up to date with trends and because of this she always looks stunning. She has shoulder length brown hair, B-cup breasts and a nice ass

Harper Stevens - 22 Marie's twin sister, the more shy and reserved one who is studying chemistry, she's very conservative in how she dresses and you know little to nothing about her, she has long brown hair, usually in a ponytail. She also has slightly bigger breasts than her sister, leading to some envy, with C-cups and a average ass.

Choa Park - 20 A Korean girl who lives on the same apartment floor as you, she seems quite popular as every time you see her she's talking on the phone, she sometimes waves at Shu, giving off a generally friendly vibe. She has short blonde hair, B-cup boobs and a nice ass, she also goes to a different school than you

Charity Ruiz - 21 year-old Latino girl. Charity is from a very wealthy family with very little to worry about in the world. She attends your college and is studying law like her father. She has long brown hair, D cup breasts and a cute ass.

Eliza Fritz - 24 a senior at your college. Eliza is studying biology in hopes of becoming a research scientist and change the world. She is of French descent and is bilingual. She has long blonde hair, blue eyes and D cup breasts


feel free to add your own characters and making the story as lively as possible
